questions.quote: Yeah.  What's goin' on? What? Really? Oh my god....did he give you a reason?...Oh boy. Okay. Alright. Thanks.  Dalrymple just cancelled the pilot.
South America?!  What kind of snow blower you get us mixed up with?
Oh ya, I think they are starting to loosen up a bit.  Oh hi Mrs. Anvino.
Tomorrow I'm going straight down to this Rudy and get my clothes.
One more thing, Benes, regarding sexual activity: Strictly prohibited, but if you absolutely must, do us all a big favour. Do it in the tub.
Diabolical. He thought of everything. He was setting me up from day one!
I don't know. A little thing called Step Nine? Instead of an apology, he was beboppin' and scattin' all over me.
I feel like a huge weight's been lifted off my shoulders. I... I... I feel happy! Kramer, I don't know how to thank you!
When the cop stopped me, I told him that I was rushing home because my friend was about to commit suicide.
We have plenty of time, too. This jury could be out for days.
